General.Name: Trimegah Securities Tbk
General.Description: PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk engages in the securities brokerage and underwriting, and investment management activities in Indonesia. Its Equity Trading division provides equity sales services in the primary market; and serves as equity brokerage in the secondary market to retail, as well as institutional investors, such as asset management companies, pension funds, and sub-broking clients. The company's Fixed Income Trading division offers selling and transaction services in the primary and secondary market for fixed income instruments, as well as retail government securities and corporate bonds. This division serves insurance companies, fund managers, pension funds, banks, and other distribution partners. Its Investment Banking division provides bonds and equity underwriting services, as well as financial advisory services comprising merger and acquisition, privatization and divestment, valuation, due diligence, corporate restructuring, and financing, as well as operates as an arranger of securities. The company also provides equity, balanced, fixed income, and money market funds for corporations, financial institutions, and pension funds, as well as acts as a mutual funds selling agent. In addition, it offers online trading and transaction financing services. The company was formerly known as PT Trimegah Securities Tbk and changed its name to PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk in July 2016. PT Trimegah Sekuritas Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
